name: Smarty Addup
description:
Smarty Addup is a unique strategy-based number game on a board!

You'll find unparalleled fun in playing board, strategy, number and even match-three puzzle (actually can be 4 or 5 or 6 or much more in this amazing game) all combined together!

There is no advertising or any in-app purchase whatsoever in the game. Pure fun of brain and casual time!
